Description:
Official Coffee Masters Certification Scoresheets, created with the Coffee Leaders team to calibrate and unify the national standard. Each criterion maps directly to Coffee Academy modules, ensuring the final certification fully covers the platform trainings.

The scoresheets include:
- Comparative Coffee Tasting (coffee vs coffee / method vs method)
- Bar Activity performance

Scoring:
- 70 pts from core, standard questions across the full curriculum (from coffee plant and processing to roasting, decaf, and our methods)
- 30 bonus pts for advanced knowledge from individual study

This structure makes preparation clear, standardizes evaluations across the country, and delivers a fairer, better candidate experience.
